content.raw:
Update:

The [trusty job hung](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-trusty-amd64/13/) with a zombie process of `INTEGRATION_twoProcessesSrvCallReplierIncreasing_aux` keeping the job from ending. I manually killed it to free up the machine.

Also, the [windows amd64 job hung](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-windows7-amd64/19/) as well. I'm about to fix it.

Could the jobs be interfering with each other through crosstalk on the local network?
